title: IIyama
s_des: Enhancing IIyama's online presence through maintenance and feature implementation.

title: Mlekpol Lottery
des: Mlekpol lottery, a leading dairy industry company in Poland. The application serves as a lottery system, handling a large amount of traffic from participants nationwide. As the lead developer, I took charge of the entire development process, from conception to implementation. I designed and built the application, ensuring its scalability and performance to handle the high volume of participants. The backend infrastructure was carefully designed to efficiently handle the load, utilizing scalable technologies and optimized algorithms. I implemented secure authentication and data encryption to protect user information. Collaborating closely with the UX/UI team, I incorporated their specific requirements and feedback into the application. Rigorous testing was conducted to ensure a seamless and secure lottery experience for participants. By delivering this full-stack application. This project showcased my expertise in full-stack development, application architecture, and effective project management.

title: Bug Tracker
des:
Bug Tracker has always been a project close to my heart. It started with a simple static HTML page and JavaScript functionality. With my growing expertise in React and Next.js, I created an enhanced version with more features. 

Now, I've set my sights on an ambitious goal - building a simplified Jira-like project. To ensure a well-designed application, I recruited a talented team of UX/UI designers, with a dedicated lead to oversee the design process. As the project lead and full-stack developer, I'm responsible for overseeing the entire development process. This role has been a valuable learning experience, helping me grow as both an engineer and a leader. Collaborating closely with the UX/UI team, I've gained insights into user-centric design and its impact on the application's success. Currently in the development phase, I'm actively building the backend functionality. Each milestone achieved teaches me valuable lessons in project management, teamwork, and technical implementation. Creating this simplified Jira is a passion project that allows me to lead a talented team. It deepens my understanding of full-stack development and hones my skills as a technical professional and leader. As the project progresses, I'm excited to continue learning, refining my expertise, and delivering a high-quality bug tracking solution that meets user needs. This experience contributes to my growth as a full-stack engineer and leader in the field.
s_des: Jire like project, my own iniciative.

title: Amuzed
des: Online game, based on Web3 technology. Contributed as a Front-End Developer. Front was written in TypeScript using Next.js, and Tailwind for its styling. Responsible for all front-end tasks including complex game logic.
s_des: Online game, based on Web3 technology.

title: Coin Casso
des: Cryptocurrency exchange platform, my first commercial experience, contributed as a Front-End Developer, front written in TypeScript, using SCSS and Material UI for styling. Introduced to Node.js and MongoDB commercially.

title: Buynomics
s_des: HubSpot cms website, with its HubL syntax .
des: Stunning website, a project in which I was the main developer. The project was especially challenging due to Hubspots cms and its native HubL syntax as well as pixel perfect implementation of the complex design.

title: Goal App
s_des: MERN stack goal application with authentication and authorization
des: MERN stack app with authentication, allows users to set goals. This project was written as part of my learning curve to become a full stack developer. Please note hosting server might need up to 30s to wake the app up.

title: Device App
des: Node.js with React, serves data to a user in a simple clear way. This project was completed as part of a successful recruitment process, in which I participated. Please note hosting server might need up to 30s to wake the app up.

title: Nort Sydney Painting
s_des: Freelance project, with a strong focus of impriving busniess sales.
des: Business website for painting & decorating business based in Sydney, Australia. Freelance project, helped the client improve sales significantly. One of my first freelanc eprojects.

title: Hwang's Chinese
s_des: Idea for a stunning restaurant website.
des: Take away app which gives customers ability to order their favorite food online. Firebase was used to serve as a backend api.

title: Weather App
s_des: Modern weather app showing real time weather.
des: Modern weather app, real time weather for most major cities.

title: Sports News
s_des: React app using JSON placeholder API
des: App which displays information, using JSON placeholder API. The application was created as part of a recruitment process. I was asked to use bootstrap as well as the JSON placeholder API.
